x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://app.local.com.br/api/v1/auth/login" 
    -d "email"="54m4q_PLLXzl" \
    -d "password"="oYFmiMk4HV(K"

get.description: Obtem a lista de todas as categorias

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X GET -G "http://app.local.com.br/api/v1/category" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod"

curl -X POST "http://app.local.com.br/api/v1/category" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \

    -d "name"="Eletrônicos" \
    -d "description"="Categoria tecnologica"

curl -X GET -G "http://app.local.com.br/api/v1/category/{category}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod"

curl -X PUT "http://app.local.com.br/api/v1/category/{category}" 
    -d "name"="Eletrônicos" \
    -d "description"="Categoria tecnologica"

curl -X DELETE "http://app.local.com.br/api/v1/category/{category}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod"

get.operationId: Display a listing of the resource.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://app.local.com.br/api/v1/product"

post.operationId: Store a newly created resource in storage.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "http://app.local.com.br/api/v1/product"
curl -X GET -G "http://app.local.com.br/api/v1/product/{product}"

put.operationId: Update the specified resource in storage.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X PUT "http://app.local.com.br/api/v1/product/{product}"

delete.operationId: Remove the specified resource from storage.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X DELETE "http://app.local.com.br/api/v1/product/{product}"
